${ModID}:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
${ModID}:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s} next turn.

${ModID}:Emptiness.NAME: Emptiness
${ModID}:Emptiness.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Contradict.NAME: Contradict
${ModID}:Contradict.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Backtrack.NAME: Backtrack
${ModID}:Backtrack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
${ModID}:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ToothAndNail.NAME: Tooth And Nail
${ModID}:ToothAndNail.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RushPast.NAME: Rush Past
${ModID}:RushPast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:TimeSlow.NAME: Time Slow
${ModID}:TimeSlow.DESCRIPTION: You cannot take damage, lose HP, or gain debuffs this turn.
${ModID}:TimeSlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You cannot take damage, lose HP, or gain debuffs this turn.
${ModID}:TimeSlow.FLAVOR: "I wish this moment could last forever."
${ModID}:TimeSlow.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: She smiled, and looked up at the stars. Things were so nice, then.

${ModID}:OppressiveAura.NAME: Oppressive Aura
${ModID}:OppressiveAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your next !M! turns, gain !${ModID}:b2! Block.

${ModID}:NightTerrors.NAME: Night Terrors
${ModID}:NightTerrors.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:InevitableForm.NAME: Inevitable Form
${ModID}:InevitableForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it. NL {@@}${ModID}:Warp !${ModID}:m2! turn{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.FLAVOR: Though a life crumbles to death, time moves ever onward.
${ModID}:InevitableForm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You can always try again. You just need to keep wanting to.

${ModID}:Deluge.NAME: Deluge
${ModID}:Deluge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.NAME: Fleeting Fortitude
${ModID}:FleetingFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Ethereal card is drawn or Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.NAME: Before Your Eyes
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted due to being Ethereal, add a random card to your hand.
${ModID}:BeforeYourEyes.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: None of them could have saved her. Not that time.

${ModID}:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
${ModID}:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each turn this combat.
${ModID}:TemporalStrike.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: After the horrible beating noise filled your ears, the next loop began in an unfamiliar environment.

${ModID}:FadeAway.NAME: Fade Away
${ModID}:FadeAway.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL A random card in your hand becomes Ethereal.

${ModID}:Dread.NAME: Dread
${ModID}:Dread.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if there is an Ethereal card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have an Ethereal card in my hand.
I ~will~ ~not~ have an Ethereal card in my hand?
I... ~didn't?~ have an Ethereal card in my hand.

${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.NAME: Obscuring Haze
${ModID}:ObscuringHaze.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you have an Ethereal card in your hand, gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Reverie.NAME: Reverie
${ModID}:Reverie.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Reverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw a card, then shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Reverie.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The moon was the last thing she saw, its bright form penetrating the rain.

${ModID}:Distort.NAME: Distort
${ModID}:Distort.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
${ModID}:BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL At the start of your next turn, lose {!${ModID}:m2!|repeat=[E] }. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BorrowedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain {!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL At the start of your next turn, lose {!${ModID}:m2!|repeat=[E] }.

${ModID}:Accumulate.NAME: Accumulate
${ModID}:Accumulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Apathy.NAME: Apathy
${ModID}:Apathy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.
${ModID}:Apathy.FLAVOR: To cosmic forms from tangent planes- We end as we began.
${ModID}:Apathy.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: As you bled out, you found yourself not caring. The loop will restart anyway.

${ModID}:Decimate.NAME: Decimate
${ModID}:Decimate.FLAVOR: With their final breath they look to the moon, and are gone.
${ModID}:Decimate.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: She always liked the moon. You're glad she took it with her.

${ModID}:PhaseShift.NAME: Phase Shift
${ModID}:PhaseShift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Daydream.NAME: Daydream
${ModID}:Daydream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Vision on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Vision.NAME: Vision
${ModID}:Vision.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You've lived through this moment hundreds of times.

${ModID}:RecurringDream.NAME: Recurring Dream
${ModID}:RecurringDream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a *Recurring *Dream this turn or last turn.

${ModID}:Persist.NAME: Persist
${ModID}:Persist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
${ModID}:Exchange.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust 1 card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.NAME: Moment Of Truth
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.DESCRIPTION: Every second time you play a *Moment *Of *Truth, reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.FLAVOR: This time, things will be different.
${ModID}:MomentOfTruth.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The rain pelted your shoulders as the moment approached. This time, things will be different.

${ModID}:DoubleTime.NAME: Double Time
${ModID}:DoubleTime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL When this effect expires, add a *Double *Time to your hand.
${ModID}:DoubleTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL When this effect expires, add a *Double *Time+ to your hand.

${ModID}:TimeSpiral.NAME: Time Spiral
${ModID}:TimeSpiral.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Add a copy of this to your hand with 2 less Block.

${ModID}:SplitSecond.NAME: Split Second
${ModID}:SplitSecond.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Warp, ${ModID}:Flashback.

${ModID}:CatchUp.NAME: Catch Up
${ModID}:CatchUp.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each time you ${ModID}:Warp this combat. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:Eternity.NAME: Eternity
${ModID}:Eternity.DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of the last card you played this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Eternity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of the last card you played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I haven't played a card yet this combat.
I ~will~ ~not~ have played a card by then...
${ModID}:Eternity.FLAVOR: What are a few tragic moments in the face of eternity?
${ModID}:Eternity.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: What is eternity, in the face of a few tragic moments?

${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.NAME: Etched In Blood
${ModID}:EtchedInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Next turn, add that card to your hand.

${ModID}:Forsake.NAME: Forsake
${ModID}:Forsake.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw !M! cards. NL You can only play cards drawn by *Forsake this turn.
${ModID}:Forsake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You can only play cards drawn by *Forsake this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I did not draw that card with Forsake.
I ~will~ ~not~ draw that card with Forsake...
I ~hadn't~ drawn that card with Forsake?

${ModID}:OverAndOver.NAME: Over And Over
${ModID}:OverAndOver.DESCRIPTION: Put the first card you play each turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
${ModID}:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage this combat.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.FLAVOR: An unquenchable frustration. You just have to let it out.
${ModID}:Overwhelm.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Every single loop you fell short. It was so, so, frustrating.

${ModID}:BranchTimeline.NAME: Branch Timeline
${ModID}:BranchTimeline.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Add a random Attack and Skill to your hand.

${ModID}:ClingingOn.NAME: Clinging On
${ModID}:ClingingOn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust unless you've played an Ethereal card this turn.

${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL {!M!|>1=They cost|@=It costs} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Unburdened.NAME: Unburdened
${ModID}:Unburdened.DESCRIPTION: The first time a card is Exhausted each turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Restraint.NAME: Restraint
${ModID}:Restraint.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Add a ${ModID}:Vision to your hand.

${ModID}:Her.NAME: Her
${ModID}:Her.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Her.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: The light left her eyes. She didn't know it, but you already have. Many, many times.

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Forget: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:HighGround.NAME: High Ground
${ModID}:HighGround.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Predict !${ModID}:m2! Attack{@@}{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CardTrick.NAME: Card Trick
${ModID}:CardTrick.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain [E]  equal to it's cost. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RhythmicSteps.NAME: Rhythmic Steps
${ModID}:RhythmicSteps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards until you draw an Attack and a Skill. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SawItComing.NAME: Saw It Coming
${ModID}:SawItComing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Predict !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} with Block.

${ModID}:Glimpse.NAME: Glimpse
${ModID}:Glimpse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Vision to your discard pile.

${ModID}:Recall.NAME: Recall
${ModID}:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Resonance.NAME: Resonance
${ModID}:Resonance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play your first Attack each turn, ${ModID}:Predict 1 Attack and play it.
${ModID}:Resonance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play your first Attack each turn, ${ModID}:Predict 1 Attack and play it.
${ModID}:Resonance.FLAVOR: The present is an echo of the past.
${ModID}:Resonance.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You knew this. You knew better than to go back. But you still did.

${ModID}:LossAversion.NAME: Loss Aversion
${ModID}:LossAversion.DESCRIPTION: Gain {@@}{!M!|repeat=[E] }. NL If a card was Exhausted this turn, gain [E] . NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fathom.NAME: Fathom
${ModID}:Fathom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL They become Ethereal.

${ModID}:SlashDash.NAME: Slash Dash
${ModID}:SlashDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NeverEnough.NAME: Never Enough
${ModID}:NeverEnough.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you take unblocked attack damage, ${ModID}:Flashback.

${ModID}:Monsoon.NAME: Monsoon
${ModID}:Monsoon.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Monsoon.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: As the rain washed her blood away, a single thought filled your head: "It should've been me."

${ModID}:TheSecondDream.NAME: The Second Dream
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.DESCRIPTION: If you've played 3 or more Ethereal cards this turn, take an extra turn after this one. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.FLAVOR: During the dream, you remembered everything clearly.
${ModID}:TheSecondDream.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Every loop numbed your memory further. So many experiences. But during the dream, you were back home.

${ModID}:LastLaugh.NAME: Last Laugh
${ModID}:LastLaugh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you run out of [E] , ${ModID}:Flashback.

${ModID}:Euphoria.NAME: Euphoria
${ModID}:Euphoria.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card. NL Shuffle !M! copies of it into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Precognition.NAME: Precognition
${ModID}:Precognition.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Vision into your draw pile. NL Whenever you play a *Vision, draw a card.

${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.NAME: The Stars Aligned
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play {@@}{!M!|>1=up to !M!|@=a} random *Vision{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile.
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.FLAVOR: A glimpse at the stars fills you with comfort.
${ModID}:TheStarsAligned.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: Everytime I see a star, I think that after all, you're not that far.

${ModID}:Elude.NAME: Elude
${ModID}:Elude.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:HowlingWinds.NAME: Howling Winds
${ModID}:HowlingWinds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played an Ethereal card this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.NAME: Eyes Wide Open
${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle {@@}{!M!|>1=!M!|@=a} *Vision{!M!|>1=s} into your draw pile.
${ModID}:EyesWideOpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle {@@}{!M!|>1=!M!|@=a} *Vision{!M!|>1=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:LowVisibility.NAME: Low Visibility
${ModID}:LowVisibility.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Forget: ${ModID}:Flashback a card.

${ModID}:LongGoodbye.NAME: Long Goodbye
${ModID}:LongGoodbye.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next !M! ${ModID}:Forget effect{@@}{!M!|>1=s} trigger twice.
${ModID}:LongGoodbye.FLAVOR: Those last few moments felt like hours.
${ModID}:LongGoodbye.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You've stopped time, and yet, you've never experienced the world as slowly as you did then.

${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.NAME: Reckless Abandon
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each Ethereal card in your hand. Exhaust.
${ModID}:RecklessAbandon.FLAVOR: Too late. You're always too late.

${ModID}:Keepsake.NAME: Keepsake
${ModID}:Keepsake.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Flashback !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PossibilityStorm.NAME: Possibility Storm
${ModID}:PossibilityStorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Predict !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} you can play.

${ModID}:OurLastDance.NAME: Our Last Dance
${ModID}:OurLastDance.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} in your discard pile. NL Play and Exhaust each one. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:OurLastDance.FLAVOR: We stopped, because it started to rain.
${ModID}:OurLastDance.ENHANCED_FLAVOR: You frowned, and she laughed. "There's always next time."
